paragraphs.text: The top-knot is a sign of honor in the Fire Nation. After becoming fugitives, Zuko and Iroh cut off their top-knots and threw them into a creek to symbolize their rejection of their homeland and the beginning of their true exile. However, Iroh readopted his trademark top-knot following his escape from prison, and Zuko wore his on formal occasions after returning to the royal palace. Before his defection from the Fire Nation army, the firebending master Jeong Jeong also wore top-knot, as shown on his wanted poster.
